name: 劉世芸
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
1.  Reading of ”The Metamorphosis” 
2.  (cont.) + The Art of story telling 
3.  Grammatical handout 1
4.  Reading of ”The Amish”
5.  (cont.) + Voluntary Simplicity 
6.  Grammatical handout 2 
7.  Writing practice 
8.  Review 
9.  Mid-term exam 
10. Reading of ”Finding a Spouse”
11. (Cont.)
12. Reading of ”Climage Changing”
13. (cont.) + Before You Say ”I Do”
14. Reading of ”Crime and Punishment”
15. (cont.) + Personal Carbon Footprint 
16. Writing practice 
17. Reading of ”To Spank or Not to Spank ” 
18.  Final exam
scorePolicy:
1.  Assignments and quizzes 40%
2.  two exams 30%
3.  two English Proficiency Tests  30%
materials:
NorthStar 3: Reading and Writing
NorthStar 3: Listening and Speaking 
        by Solorzano and Schmidt
